Passive Effect: Deployment does not consume deployment slots.
After deployment, ATK +60% and gain 2 Shields. After skill duration, automatically retreat and extend Redeployment Time by 25%. If the previously deployed Operator is from Kazimierz, the Redeployment Time will not be extended

Summons a "Blazing Sun" on a deployable ground tile within the four adjacent tiles, dealing 80% of ATK as True damage to nearby enemies and Stunning them for 3 seconds. Attack Range expands, ATK +40%, DEF +20% and damage type changes to True damage when attacking enemies blocked by self or the "Blazing Sun"

elite_levels.description: When deploying, deals 50% of ATK as True Damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles and Stuns them for 2 seconds. If the previously deployed Operator is from Kazimierz, deals an additional hit
When deploying, deals 80% of ATK as True Damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles and Stuns them for 3 seconds. If the previously deployed Operator is from Kazimierz, deals an additional hit
